mapper.sql: wonoi.id, wonoi.order_number, wonoi.warehouse_id, wonoi.warehouse_code, wonoi.warehouse_name, wonoi.ower_id, wonoi.ower_code, wonoi.ower_name, wonoi.document_type, wonoi.order_source_type, wonoi.external_order_number_first, wonoi.external_order_number_second, wonoi.customer_id,wonoi.customer_code, wonoi.customer_name, wonoi.plan_delivery_time, wonoi.column_one, wonoi.column_two, wonoi.all_count, wonoi.all_height, wonoi.all_volume, wonoi.confirm_by, wonoi.confirm_time, wonoi.order_status_type, wonoi.real_delivery_time, wonoi.tenant_code, wonoi.remark, wonoi.is_deleted, wonoi.create_by, wonoi.create_time, wonoi.update_by, wonoi.update_time, wonoi.unit,wonoi.car_barnd, wonoi.car_model,wonoi.car_driver,wonoi.car_relation,wonoi.main_order,wonoi.plan_send_time, (SELECT sdi.item_text FROM sys_dict_item sdi LEFT JOIN sys_dict sd ON sd.is_deleted = 0 AND sd.id = sdi.dict_id WHERE sdi.is_deleted = 0 AND sdi.`status` = 1 AND sd.dict_code = 'outboundNoticeDocumentType' AND wonoi.document_type = sdi.item_value) documentType_text, (SELECT sdi.item_text FROM sys_dict_item sdi LEFT JOIN sys_dict sd ON sd.is_deleted = 0 AND sd.id = sdi.dict_id WHERE sdi.is_deleted = 0 AND sdi.`status` = 1 AND sd.dict_code = 'outboundNoticeOrderSourceType' AND wonoi.order_source_type = sdi.item_value) orderSourceType_text, (SELECT sdi.item_text FROM sys_dict_item sdi LEFT JOIN sys_dict sd ON sd.is_deleted = 0 AND sd.id = sdi.dict_id WHERE sdi.is_deleted = 0 AND sdi.`status` = 1 AND sd.dict_code = 'outboundNoticeOrderStatusType' AND wonoi.order_status_type = sdi.item_value) orderStatusType_text
mapper.update: UPDATE wms_outbound_notice_order_info SET is_deleted = 1 ,update_by=#{username},update_time=now() WHERE id = ${id} AND is_deleted = 0
